chapter.title: Enabling Public AMIs from Amazon EC2
chapter.para: Alter the Main Configuration File to enable public AMIs from Amazon EC2. The following procedure makes public images viewable in CloudForms Management Engine.

step.para: Select the configuration file to edit from the File list. If not already automatically selected, select EVM Server Main Configuration.

step.screen: ems_refresh: capture_vm_created_on_date: false ec2: get_private_images: true get_shared_images: true get_public_images: false ignore_terminated_instances: true

step.para: Configure the visibility of public images:
To show public images, set the parameter to get_public_images: true.
To remove public images from view again, set the parameter to get_public_images: false.

note.para: For information on other parameters, see "Configuration Parameters" in the Settings and Operations Guide.
